Optoma Remote controller Code ML750e
NEC V2 - DEVICE: 16d - SUBDEVICE : 200d
Power   : 00010000-11001000-11101000-00010111 COMMAND : 232d
source  : 00010000-11001000-10011000-01100111 COMMAND : 152d
ligh    : 00010000-11001000-00101000-11010111 COMMAND : 40d
menu    : 00010000-11001000-10001000-01110111 COMMAND : 136d
up      : 00010000-11001000-10110000-01001111 COMMAND : 176d
hide    : 00010000-11001000-01000010-10111101 COMMAND : 66d
left    : 00010000-11001000-01110000-10001111 COMMAND : 112d
enter   : 00010000-11001000-11001000-00110111 COMMAND : 200d
right   : 00010000-11001000-11110000-00001111 COMMAND : 240d
expand  : 00010000-11001000-00011010-11100101 COMMAND : 26d
down    : 00010000-11001000-00001000-11110111 COMMAND : 100d
tiltup  : 00010000-11001000-00011100-11100011 COMMAND : 28d
vol+    : 00010000-11001000-10011100-01100011 COMMAND : 156d
stop    : 00010000-11001000-10101100-01010011 COMMAND : 172d
tiltdown: 00010000-11001000-11101100-00010011 COMMAND : 236d
vol-    : 00010000-11001000-11001100-00110011 COMMAND : 204d
backward: 00010000-11001000-00101100-11010011 COMMAND : 44d
forward : 00010000-11001000-01101100-10010011 COMMAND : 108d

(d) at the end means decimal.
1st byte is the device address
2rd byte is sub device address
3rd byte is the command byte and 4 byte is the complete of 3rd byte

For more information read NEC Protocol
[NOT TESTED]
